3#define MLX_MTL_CONST static constant constexpr const
4#define MLX_MTL_LOOP_UNROLL _Pragma("clang loop unroll(full)")
5
6using namespace metal;
7
8// Based on GPU merge sort algorithm at
9// https://github.com/NVIDIA/cccl/tree/main/cub/cub
10
12// Thread-level sort
14
15template <typename T>
16METAL_FUNC void thread_swap(thread T& a, thread T& b) {
17 T w = a;
18 a = b;
19 b = w;
20}
21
22template <typename T>
23struct LessThan {
24 static constexpr constant T init = Limits<T>::max;
25
26 METAL_FUNC bool operator()(T a, T b) {
27 return a < b;
28 }
29};
30
31template <
32 typename val_t,
33 typename idx_t,
34 bool ARG_SORT,
35 short N_PER_THREAD,
36 typename CompareOp>
37struct ThreadSort {
38 static METAL_FUNC void sort(
39 thread val_t (&vals)[N_PER_THREAD],
40 thread idx_t (&idxs)[N_PER_THREAD]) {
41 CompareOp op;
42
43 MLX_MTL_LOOP_UNROLL
44 for (short i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
45 MLX_MTL_LOOP_UNROLL
46 for (short j = i & 1; j < N_PER_THREAD - 1; j += 2) {
47 if (op(vals[j + 1], vals[j])) {
48 thread_swap(vals[j + 1], vals[j]);
49 thread_swap(idxs[j + 1], idxs[j]);
50 }
51 }
52 }
53 }
54};
55
57// Threadgroup-level sort
59
60template <
61 typename val_t,
62 typename idx_t,
63 bool ARG_SORT,
64 short BLOCK_THREADS,
65 short N_PER_THREAD,
66 typename CompareOp>
67struct BlockMergeSort {
68 using thread_sort_t =
69 ThreadSort<val_t, idx_t, ARG_SORT, N_PER_THREAD, CompareOp>;
70 static METAL_FUNC int merge_partition(
71 const threadgroup val_t* As,
72 const threadgroup val_t* Bs,
73 short A_sz,
74 short B_sz,
75 short sort_md) {
76 CompareOp op;
77
78 short A_st = max(0, sort_md - B_sz);
79 short A_ed = min(sort_md, A_sz);
80
81 while (A_st < A_ed) {
82 short md = A_st + (A_ed - A_st) / 2;
83 auto a = As[md];
84 auto b = Bs[sort_md - 1 - md];
85
86 if (op(b, a)) {
87 A_ed = md;
88 } else {
89 A_st = md + 1;
90 }
91 }
92
93 return A_ed;
94 }
95
96 static METAL_FUNC void merge_step(
97 const threadgroup val_t* As,
98 const threadgroup val_t* Bs,
99 const threadgroup idx_t* As_idx,
100 const threadgroup idx_t* Bs_idx,
101 short A_sz,
102 short B_sz,
103 thread val_t (&vals)[N_PER_THREAD],
104 thread idx_t (&idxs)[N_PER_THREAD]) {
105 CompareOp op;
106 short a_idx = 0;
107 short b_idx = 0;
108
109 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
110 auto a = As[a_idx];
111 auto b = Bs[b_idx];
112 bool pred = (b_idx < B_sz) && (a_idx >= A_sz || op(b, a));
113
114 vals[i] = pred ? b : a;
115 idxs[i] = pred ? Bs_idx[b_idx] : As_idx[a_idx];
116
117 b_idx += short(pred);
118 a_idx += short(!pred);
119 }
120 }
121
122 static METAL_FUNC void sort(
123 threadgroup val_t* tgp_vals [[threadgroup(0)]],
124 threadgroup idx_t* tgp_idxs [[threadgroup(1)]],
125 int size_sorted_axis,
126 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
127 // Get thread location
128 int idx = lid.x * N_PER_THREAD;
129
130 // Load from shared memory
131 thread val_t thread_vals[N_PER_THREAD];
132 thread idx_t thread_idxs[N_PER_THREAD];
133 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
134 thread_vals[i] = tgp_vals[idx + i];
135 if (ARG_SORT) {
136 thread_idxs[i] = tgp_idxs[idx + i];
137 }
138 }
139
140 // Per thread sort
141 if (idx < size_sorted_axis) {
142 thread_sort_t::sort(thread_vals, thread_idxs);
143 }
144
145 // Do merges using threadgroup memory
146 for (int merge_threads = 2; merge_threads <= BLOCK_THREADS;
147 merge_threads *= 2) {
148 // Update threadgroup memory
149 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
150 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
151 tgp_vals[idx + i] = thread_vals[i];
152 if (ARG_SORT) {
153 tgp_idxs[idx + i] = thread_idxs[i];
154 }
155 }
156 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
157
158 // Find location in merge step
159 int merge_group = lid.x / merge_threads;
160 int merge_lane = lid.x % merge_threads;
161
162 int sort_sz = N_PER_THREAD * merge_threads;
163 int sort_st = N_PER_THREAD * merge_threads * merge_group;
164
165 // As = tgp_vals[A_st:A_ed] is sorted
166 // Bs = tgp_vals[B_st:B_ed] is sorted
167 int A_st = sort_st;
168 int A_ed = sort_st + sort_sz / 2;
169 int B_st = sort_st + sort_sz / 2;
170 int B_ed = sort_st + sort_sz;
171
172 const threadgroup val_t* As = tgp_vals + A_st;
173 const threadgroup val_t* Bs = tgp_vals + B_st;
174 int A_sz = A_ed - A_st;
175 int B_sz = B_ed - B_st;
176
177 // Find a partition of merge elements
178 // Ci = merge(As[partition:], Bs[sort_md - partition:])
179 // of size N_PER_THREAD for each merge lane i
180 // C = [Ci] is sorted
181 int sort_md = N_PER_THREAD * merge_lane;
182 int partition = merge_partition(As, Bs, A_sz, B_sz, sort_md);
183
184 As += partition;
185 Bs += sort_md - partition;
186
187 A_sz -= partition;
188 B_sz -= sort_md - partition;
189
190 const threadgroup idx_t* As_idx =
191 ARG_SORT ? tgp_idxs + A_st + partition : nullptr;
192 const threadgroup idx_t* Bs_idx =
193 ARG_SORT ? tgp_idxs + B_st + sort_md - partition : nullptr;
194
195 // Merge starting at the partition and store results in thread registers
196 merge_step(As, Bs, As_idx, Bs_idx, A_sz, B_sz, thread_vals, thread_idxs);
197 }
198
199 // Write out to shared memory
200 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
201 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
202 tgp_vals[idx + i] = thread_vals[i];
203 if (ARG_SORT) {
204 tgp_idxs[idx + i] = thread_idxs[i];
205 }
206 }
207 }
208};
209
211// Kernel sort
213
214template <
215 typename T,
216 typename U,
217 bool ARG_SORT,
218 short BLOCK_THREADS,
219 short N_PER_THREAD,
220 typename CompareOp = LessThan<T>>
221struct KernelMergeSort {
222 using val_t = T;
223 using idx_t = uint;
224 using block_merge_sort_t = BlockMergeSort<
225 val_t,
226 idx_t,
227 ARG_SORT,
228 BLOCK_THREADS,
229 N_PER_THREAD,
230 CompareOp>;
231
232 MLX_MTL_CONST short N_PER_BLOCK = BLOCK_THREADS * N_PER_THREAD;
233
234 static METAL_FUNC void block_sort(
235 const device T* inp,
236 device U* out,
237 const constant int& size_sorted_axis,
238 const constant int& stride_sorted_axis,
239 const constant int& stride_segment_axis,
240 threadgroup val_t* tgp_vals,
241 threadgroup idx_t* tgp_idxs,
242 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
243 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
244 // tid.y tells us the segment index
245 inp += tid.y * stride_segment_axis;
246 out += tid.y * stride_segment_axis;
247
248 // Copy into threadgroup memory
249 for (short i = lid.x; i < N_PER_BLOCK; i += BLOCK_THREADS) {
250 tgp_vals[i] = i < size_sorted_axis ? inp[i * stride_sorted_axis]
251 : val_t(CompareOp::init);
252 if (ARG_SORT) {
253 tgp_idxs[i] = i;
254 }
255 }
256
257 // Sort elements within the block
258 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
259
260 block_merge_sort_t::sort(tgp_vals, tgp_idxs, size_sorted_axis, lid);
261
262 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
263
264 // Write output
265 for (int i = lid.x; i < size_sorted_axis; i += BLOCK_THREADS) {
266 if (ARG_SORT) {
267 out[i * stride_sorted_axis] = tgp_idxs[i];
268 } else {
269 out[i * stride_sorted_axis] = tgp_vals[i];
270 }
271 }
272 }
273};
274
275template <
276 typename T,
277 typename U,
278 bool ARG_SORT,
279 short BLOCK_THREADS,
280 short N_PER_THREAD>
281[[kernel, max_total_threads_per_threadgroup(BLOCK_THREADS)]] void block_sort(
282 const device T* inp [[buffer(0)]],
283 device U* out [[buffer(1)]],
284 const constant int& size_sorted_axis [[buffer(2)]],
285 const constant int& stride_sorted_axis [[buffer(3)]],
286 const constant int& stride_segment_axis [[buffer(4)]],
287 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
288 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
289 using sort_kernel =
290 KernelMergeSort<T, U, ARG_SORT, BLOCK_THREADS, N_PER_THREAD>;
291 using val_t = typename sort_kernel::val_t;
292 using idx_t = typename sort_kernel::idx_t;
293
294 if (ARG_SORT) {
295 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
296 threadgroup idx_t tgp_idxs[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
297 sort_kernel::block_sort(
298 inp,
299 out,
300 size_sorted_axis,
301 stride_sorted_axis,
302 stride_segment_axis,
303 tgp_vals,
304 tgp_idxs,
305 tid,
306 lid);
307 } else {
308 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
309 sort_kernel::block_sort(
310 inp,
311 out,
312 size_sorted_axis,
313 stride_sorted_axis,
314 stride_segment_axis,
315 tgp_vals,
316 nullptr,
317 tid,
318 lid);
319 }
320}
321
322constant constexpr const int zero_helper = 0;
323
324template <
325 typename T,
326 typename U,
327 bool ARG_SORT,
328 short BLOCK_THREADS,
329 short N_PER_THREAD>
330[[kernel, max_total_threads_per_threadgroup(BLOCK_THREADS)]] void block_sort_nc(
331 const device T* inp [[buffer(0)]],
332 device U* out [[buffer(1)]],
333 const constant int& size_sorted_axis [[buffer(2)]],
334 const constant int& stride_sorted_axis [[buffer(3)]],
335 const constant int& nc_dim [[buffer(4)]],
336 const device int* nc_shape [[buffer(5)]],
337 const device size_t* nc_strides [[buffer(6)]],
338 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
339 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
340 using sort_kernel =
341 KernelMergeSort<T, U, ARG_SORT, BLOCK_THREADS, N_PER_THREAD>;
342 using val_t = typename sort_kernel::val_t;
343 using idx_t = typename sort_kernel::idx_t;
344
345 auto block_idx = elem_to_loc(tid.y, nc_shape, nc_strides, nc_dim);
346 inp += block_idx;
347 out += block_idx;
348
349 if (ARG_SORT) {
350 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
351 threadgroup idx_t tgp_idxs[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
352 sort_kernel::block_sort(
353 inp,
354 out,
355 size_sorted_axis,
356 stride_sorted_axis,
357 zero_helper,
358 tgp_vals,
359 tgp_idxs,
360 tid,
361 lid);
362 } else {
363 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
364 sort_kernel::block_sort(
365 inp,
366 out,
367 size_sorted_axis,
368 stride_sorted_axis,
369 zero_helper,
370 tgp_vals,
371 nullptr,
372 tid,
373 lid);
374 }
375}
376
377template <
378 typename val_t,
379 typename idx_t,
380 bool ARG_SORT,
381 short BLOCK_THREADS,
382 short N_PER_THREAD,
383 typename CompareOp = LessThan<val_t>>
384struct KernelMultiBlockMergeSort {
385 using block_merge_sort_t = BlockMergeSort<
386 val_t,
387 idx_t,
388 ARG_SORT,
389 BLOCK_THREADS,
390 N_PER_THREAD,
391 CompareOp>;
392
393 MLX_MTL_CONST short N_PER_BLOCK = BLOCK_THREADS * N_PER_THREAD;
394
395 static METAL_FUNC void block_sort(
396 const device val_t* inp,
397 device val_t* out_vals,
398 device idx_t* out_idxs,
399 const constant int& size_sorted_axis,
400 const constant int& stride_sorted_axis,
401 threadgroup val_t* tgp_vals,
402 threadgroup idx_t* tgp_idxs,
403 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
404 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
405 // tid.y tells us the segment index
406 int base_idx = tid.x * N_PER_BLOCK;
407
408 // Copy into threadgroup memory
409 for (short i = lid.x; i < N_PER_BLOCK; i += BLOCK_THREADS) {
410 int idx = base_idx + i;
411 tgp_vals[i] = idx < size_sorted_axis ? inp[idx * stride_sorted_axis]
412 : val_t(CompareOp::init);
413 tgp_idxs[i] = idx;
414 }
415
416 // Sort elements within the block
417 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
418
419 block_merge_sort_t::sort(tgp_vals, tgp_idxs, size_sorted_axis, lid);
420
421 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
422
423 // Write output
424 for (int i = lid.x; i < N_PER_BLOCK; i += BLOCK_THREADS) {
425 int idx = base_idx + i;
426 if (idx < size_sorted_axis) {
427 out_vals[idx] = tgp_vals[i];
428 out_idxs[idx] = tgp_idxs[i];
429 }
430 }
431 }
432
433 static METAL_FUNC int merge_partition(
434 const device val_t* As,
435 const device val_t* Bs,
436 int A_sz,
437 int B_sz,
438 int sort_md) {
439 CompareOp op;
440
441 int A_st = max(0, sort_md - B_sz);
442 int A_ed = min(sort_md, A_sz);
443
444 while (A_st < A_ed) {
445 int md = A_st + (A_ed - A_st) / 2;
446 auto a = As[md];
447 auto b = Bs[sort_md - 1 - md];
448
449 if (op(b, a)) {
450 A_ed = md;
451 } else {
452 A_st = md + 1;
453 }
454 }
455
456 return A_ed;
457 }
458};
459
460template <
461 typename val_t,
462 typename idx_t,
463 bool ARG_SORT,
464 short BLOCK_THREADS,
465 short N_PER_THREAD>
466[[kernel, max_total_threads_per_threadgroup(BLOCK_THREADS)]] void mb_block_sort(
467 const device val_t* inp [[buffer(0)]],
468 device val_t* out_vals [[buffer(1)]],
469 device idx_t* out_idxs [[buffer(2)]],
470 const constant int& size_sorted_axis [[buffer(3)]],
471 const constant int& stride_sorted_axis [[buffer(4)]],
472 const constant int& nc_dim [[buffer(5)]],
473 const device int* nc_shape [[buffer(6)]],
474 const device size_t* nc_strides [[buffer(7)]],
475 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
476 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
477 using sort_kernel = KernelMultiBlockMergeSort<
478 val_t,
479 idx_t,
480 ARG_SORT,
481 BLOCK_THREADS,
482 N_PER_THREAD>;
483
484 auto block_idx = elem_to_loc(tid.y, nc_shape, nc_strides, nc_dim);
485 inp += block_idx;
486 out_vals += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
487 out_idxs += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
488
489 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
490 threadgroup idx_t tgp_idxs[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
491
492 sort_kernel::block_sort(
493 inp,
494 out_vals,
495 out_idxs,
496 size_sorted_axis,
497 stride_sorted_axis,
498 tgp_vals,
499 tgp_idxs,
500 tid,
501 lid);
502}
503
504template <
505 typename val_t,
506 typename idx_t,
507 bool ARG_SORT,
508 short BLOCK_THREADS,
509 short N_PER_THREAD>
510[[kernel, max_total_threads_per_threadgroup(BLOCK_THREADS)]] void
511mb_block_partition(
512 device idx_t* block_partitions [[buffer(0)]],
513 const device val_t* dev_vals [[buffer(1)]],
514 const device idx_t* dev_idxs [[buffer(2)]],
515 const constant int& size_sorted_axis [[buffer(3)]],
516 const constant int& merge_tiles [[buffer(4)]],
517 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
518 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]],
519 uint3 tgp_dims [[threads_per_threadgroup]]) {
520 using sort_kernel = KernelMultiBlockMergeSort<
521 val_t,
522 idx_t,
523 ARG_SORT,
524 BLOCK_THREADS,
525 N_PER_THREAD>;
526
527 block_partitions += tid.y * tgp_dims.x;
528 dev_vals += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
529 dev_idxs += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
530
531 // Find location in merge step
532 int merge_group = lid.x / merge_tiles;
533 int merge_lane = lid.x % merge_tiles;
534
535 int sort_sz = sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * merge_tiles;
536 int sort_st = sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * merge_tiles * merge_group;
537
538 int A_st = min(size_sorted_axis, sort_st);
539 int A_ed = min(size_sorted_axis, sort_st + sort_sz / 2);
540 int B_st = A_ed;
541 int B_ed = min(size_sorted_axis, B_st + sort_sz / 2);
542
543 int partition_at = min(B_ed - A_st, sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * merge_lane);
544 int partition = sort_kernel::merge_partition(
545 dev_vals + A_st, dev_vals + B_st, A_ed - A_st, B_ed - B_st, partition_at);
546
547 block_partitions[lid.x] = A_st + partition;
548}
549
550template <
551 typename val_t,
552 typename idx_t,
553 bool ARG_SORT,
554 short BLOCK_THREADS,
555 short N_PER_THREAD,
556 typename CompareOp = LessThan<val_t>>
557[[kernel, max_total_threads_per_threadgroup(BLOCK_THREADS)]] void
558mb_block_merge(
559 const device idx_t* block_partitions [[buffer(0)]],
560 const device val_t* dev_vals_in [[buffer(1)]],
561 const device idx_t* dev_idxs_in [[buffer(2)]],
562 device val_t* dev_vals_out [[buffer(3)]],
563 device idx_t* dev_idxs_out [[buffer(4)]],
564 const constant int& size_sorted_axis [[buffer(5)]],
565 const constant int& merge_tiles [[buffer(6)]],
566 const constant int& num_tiles [[buffer(7)]],
567 uint3 tid [[threadgroup_position_in_grid]],
568 uint3 lid [[thread_position_in_threadgroup]]) {
569 using sort_kernel = KernelMultiBlockMergeSort<
570 val_t,
571 idx_t,
572 ARG_SORT,
573 BLOCK_THREADS,
574 N_PER_THREAD,
575 CompareOp>;
576
577 using block_sort_t = typename sort_kernel::block_merge_sort_t;
578
579 block_partitions += tid.y * (num_tiles + 1);
580 dev_vals_in += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
581 dev_idxs_in += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
582 dev_vals_out += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
583 dev_idxs_out += tid.y * size_sorted_axis;
584
585 int block_idx = tid.x;
586 int merge_group = block_idx / merge_tiles;
587 int sort_st = sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * merge_tiles * merge_group;
588 int sort_sz = sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * merge_tiles;
589 int sort_md = sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK * block_idx - sort_st;
590
591 int A_st = block_partitions[block_idx + 0];
592 int A_ed = block_partitions[block_idx + 1];
593 int B_st = min(size_sorted_axis, 2 * sort_st + sort_sz / 2 + sort_md - A_st);
594 int B_ed = min(
595 size_sorted_axis,
596 2 * sort_st + sort_sz / 2 + sort_md + sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK - A_ed);
597
598 if ((block_idx % merge_tiles) == merge_tiles - 1) {
599 A_ed = min(size_sorted_axis, sort_st + sort_sz / 2);
600 B_ed = min(size_sorted_axis, sort_st + sort_sz);
601 }
602
603 int A_sz = A_ed - A_st;
604 int B_sz = B_ed - B_st;
605
606 // Load from global memory
607 thread val_t thread_vals[N_PER_THREAD];
608 thread idx_t thread_idxs[N_PER_THREAD];
609 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; i++) {
610 int idx = BLOCK_THREADS * i + lid.x;
611 if (idx < (A_sz + B_sz)) {
612 thread_vals[i] = (idx < A_sz) ? dev_vals_in[A_st + idx]
613 : dev_vals_in[B_st + idx - A_sz];
614 thread_idxs[i] = (idx < A_sz) ? dev_idxs_in[A_st + idx]
615 : dev_idxs_in[B_st + idx - A_sz];
616 } else {
617 thread_vals[i] = CompareOp::init;
618 thread_idxs[i] = 0;
619 }
620 }
621
622 // Write to shared memory
623 threadgroup val_t tgp_vals[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
624 threadgroup idx_t tgp_idxs[sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK];
625 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
626 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; i++) {
627 int idx = BLOCK_THREADS * i + lid.x;
628 tgp_vals[idx] = thread_vals[i];
629 tgp_idxs[idx] = thread_idxs[i];
630 }
631 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
632
633 // Merge
634 int sort_md_local = min(A_sz + B_sz, N_PER_THREAD * int(lid.x));
635
636 int A_st_local = block_sort_t::merge_partition(
637 tgp_vals, tgp_vals + A_sz, A_sz, B_sz, sort_md_local);
638 int A_ed_local = A_sz;
639
640 int B_st_local = sort_md_local - A_st_local;
641 int B_ed_local = B_sz;
642
643 int A_sz_local = A_ed_local - A_st_local;
644 int B_sz_local = B_ed_local - B_st_local;
645
646 // Do merge
647 block_sort_t::merge_step(
648 tgp_vals + A_st_local,
649 tgp_vals + A_ed_local + B_st_local,
650 tgp_idxs + A_st_local,
651 tgp_idxs + A_ed_local + B_st_local,
652 A_sz_local,
653 B_sz_local,
654 thread_vals,
655 thread_idxs);
656
657 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
658 for (int i = 0; i < N_PER_THREAD; ++i) {
659 int idx = lid.x * N_PER_THREAD;
660 tgp_vals[idx + i] = thread_vals[i];
661 tgp_idxs[idx + i] = thread_idxs[i];
662 }
663
664 threadgroup_barrier(mem_flags::mem_threadgroup);
665 // Write output
666 int base_idx = tid.x * sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK;
667 for (int i = lid.x; i < sort_kernel::N_PER_BLOCK; i += BLOCK_THREADS) {
668 int idx = base_idx + i;
669 if (idx < size_sorted_axis) {
670 dev_vals_out[idx] = tgp_vals[i];
671 dev_idxs_out[idx] = tgp_idxs[i];
672 }
673 }
